reviews.review:
What. A. Cool. Game.

10/10 for playability 20 years later.

Фигня, игра скатилась, если раньше можно было играть нормально, то сейчас полный бред, почти в каждой катке читеры и смурфы, так ещё и попадаются люди без прайма с 0 уровнем стима, которые могут спокойно подрубить, если начнут проигрывать. А комьюнити игры состоит из одних токсиков, злых школьников, да овощей, которые только могут ныть и орать в чате... Крч лучше не играть в это убожество.
Slightly less painful than testicular torture
Я потомственный болтовщик люблю игры наподобие на таких и твердые палки друзей!
Good Game! I'm playing it for years and the cheaters are problems but if we don't count the cheaters then this is the best game ever!
Look its not great now its free
Quite an interesting game in which you will be told who you are, who your parents are.
Jogo muito bom , e muito competitivo consegue prender o jogador por muitas horas
This game is fun and really enjoyable!
pretty nice real good real good

very good game gave me a ton of happy times
Pretty fun game, with fast matchmaking due to large amount of players

I think it's a pretty good game

Best 5vs5 game ever but i dont like it so much because its free now
it's ok i think, lots of russian boiz

my first time buying this game was "speechless" or "amazed" how it changed from the old to the current one we have that game i played a few hours every day seems alright csgo itself a hard time game to be good i like the game honestly
This game is a timeless masterpeice, its mechanics and gameplay is simple but refined and makes this game still fun to play..
Way to many cheaters these days
Quite a fun game, can be tilting when team mates don't cooperate. 9.5/10

даже перчатки добавили, мы их так ждали!

very good game. it is a ot of fun with friends. it takes a lot of time to master the game and there is no better feeling than seeing your own progress and how much you have improved

very epic indeed, ive met hella chicks on this game
